name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Senior React Developer with expertise in **React.js**, **JavaScript (ES6+)**, **TypeScript**, and state management using **Redux** to create dynamic and responsive user interfaces. Skilled in CSS frameworks like **SASS/LESS**, **TailwindCSS**, and **Bootstrap**, and proficient in modern build tools such as **Webpack**, **Vite**, and **Parcel**. Experience in developing **REST APIs** and integrating **AWS services** for scalable backend solutions. Committed to **Test-Driven Development (TDD)** and employing **Asynchronous programming** principles to enhance application performance. A strong communicator with a proven track record in delivering robust applications within the **financial services**, **capital markets**, and **insurance** sectors, ensuring clean and efficient code that drives user engagement and satisfaction.

experience.responsibilities:
- Developed engaging and responsive user interfaces using **React.js**, **Typescript**, and **Redux**, maximizing user satisfaction and reducing load times by **40%**.
- Implemented RESTful APIs aligned with **AWS services**, ensuring data integrity and enhancing application performance by **30%**.
- Ensured high code quality and reliability through **Test-Driven Development (TDD)**, fostering a culture of continuous improvement and collaboration.
- Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver projects within timelines, utilizing agile methodologies and ensuring seamless communication.
- Built efficient state management solutions with **React Query** and **Context API**, enhancing scalability and performance.
- Developed modern UI components using **SASS/LESS**, **TailwindCSS**, and **Bootstrap**, ensuring consistent design across applications.
- Utilized **Webpack** for optimizing frontend asset delivery, reducing bundle sizes by **25%**.
- Streamlined development processes with **GIT**, promoting effective version control and team collaboration.
- Raised application robustness with asynchronous programming techniques, addressing performance bottlenecks effectively.

• Developed interactive web applications using **React.js**, enhancing user experience with **JavaScript (ES6+)** and **TypeScript**.
• Implemented state management using **Redux**, resulting in a **30%** improvement in application performance during high traffic.
• Applied **TailwindCSS** and **SASS** for responsive design, improving loading times by **15%** across various screens.
• Designed and integrated **REST APIs** for seamless data exchange, ensuring 99% uptime for the financial services platform.
• Collaborated using **GIT** for version control, maintaining a structured codebase across **5+** team members.
• Employed **Test-Driven Development (TDD)** principles, leading to a **40%** reduction in bugs during production rollouts.
• Optimized build processes using **Webpack** and **Parcel**, minimizing build time by **20%**.
• Utilized **AWS services** for scalable deployment solutions, enhancing application reliability during peak usage.
• Conducted code reviews and implemented best practices, fostering a culture of problem-solving and effective communication within the team.
• Mentored **3** junior developers on new technologies including **React Query** and **Context API**, promoting continuous learning.

• Developed interactive user interfaces using **React.js** and **Typescript**, enhancing user engagement by 50%.
• Implemented state management with **Redux**, improving application scalability across **5+** modules.
• Created responsive styles using **SASS/LESS** and **TailwindCSS**, ensuring cross-browser compatibility on **95%** of devices.
• Built and integrated **REST APIs** for seamless backend communication, achieving a response time reduction of **20%**.
• Employed **Test-Driven Development (TDD)** techniques to enhance code quality, leading to a **40%** decrease in post-deployment bugs.
• Utilized **Webpack** and **Parcel** for efficient module bundling, achieving load time reductions of up to **30%**.
• Leveraged **AWS services** for deployment and scaling, optimizing performance and reliability in financial applications.
• Collaborated in an Agile environment, applying strong problem-solving skills and effective communication in team settings.
